mapper.select: SELECT user.id , user.deleted , user.created_at as createdAt , user.modified_at as modifiedAt , user.username , user.name , user.phone FROM user WHERE user.id = #{id}

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username = #{username} AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')

SELECT user.id FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username = #{username} AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%') ORDER BY user.id user.name DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(user.id) as listsize FROM user WHERE user.id is not NULL AND user.deleted = #{deleted} AND user.username = #{username} AND user.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}, '%')
